title: Hire designer for Product Application UI Kit
body:
Hey everyone,

Hereby the official vote to hire a designer to design the Product Application UI Kit

Assignment: Product Application UI Kit
Payment: 0.75Ξ ($3,312.37) or 1.31Ξ ($5,796.64) with bonus applied.

We've had many designers apply for this bounty. Below are the applications that got the most upvotes on Discord.

Name: Antoine Plu
Votes in Discord: 6x 👍 | 2x 👀 | 1x 👎
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/917374681286320179

Name: Ciaran Hanrahan
Votes in Discord: 12x 👍
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/917435008870936656

Name: Maarten Afink.
Votes in Discord: 6x 👍 | 1x 👀
Application: https://discord.com/channels/897354336143822848/915844532485115925/917756467786969128

------
Who do we want to hire for this application?

N.B. Designers may apply to other bounties if they do not get hired on this vote.
author: 0x1bCbbd7f9415768338f92A9B8758fa4ABeE4FFD0
